## v2.0.5
* Fixed serviceId parsing to consider `urn`

## v2.0.4
* Fixed infinite loop issue

## v2.0.3
* Rolled back 2.0.2 due to inifinite loop issue

## v2.0.2
* Fixed failure when module dependency list in the module package.json does not exist
* Fixed not handling module which does not have config/config.json while still referening to modules that have config/config.json
* Refactored and added unit tests

## v2.0.1
* Fixed the default serviceId by changing `urn:default:<service_name>` to `urn:REST:<service_name>`

## v2.0.0
* Exposed the ability to extract all services through a function 

## v1.0.1
* Added additional attributes to JSON/Yaml file
